column4: Hello.  I have ubuntu intrepid.  I'm having a problem with accidental touchpad clicks when im typing, it just jumps up a couple of lines if i accidently hit it with my palm.  I read somewhere that i can change something in the input device section of xorg.conf file.  But i don't have that section in mine.  any idea?
if you know what your are doing just add the lines.
i don't really know what im doing. haha. here's the link if you could help: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=132590
any ideas or should i try something else?
